author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: Hey folks, it looks like we have consensus in merging https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3095 ? We have already implemented this change in Teku (sitting as a PR, haven't merged it yet to keep Teku nodes in the testnet healthy). What's the status from other teams?

author: sproul
content: we (Lighthouse) don't have it implemented yet but are supportive and could get it done for the next devnet

author: potuz
content: I have the PR out as of today, but I can't merge it cause it breaks spectests

author: potuz
content: I would rather not test on devnet until testvectors are up
